00012 // -- CLASS DESCRIPTION [BDKPDFWRAPPER] --
00013 // 
00014 // Wrapper for an incoherent sum of BW's
00015 //

00032 // Constructors:
00033 BdkPdfDDalitzInc::BdkPdfDDalitzInc() : 
00034   _externalResPdfs(kFALSE)
00035 {
00036   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00037 }

00039 
00040 BdkPdfDDalitzInc::BdkPdfDDalitzInc(const char * theName, const char * theDesc,
00041                                    RooAbsReal & m12, RooAbsReal & m13, 
00042                                    BdkDalitzBase::Flavor flavor, 
00043                                    Int_t spinResComp,
00044                                    BdkPdfDDalitzInc* externalAmps) : 
00045   _externalResPdfs(kFALSE)
00046 {
00047   init(theName, theDesc, m12, m13, flavor, spinResComp);
00048 }
00049 
00050 // destructor:
00051 BdkPdfDDalitzInc::~BdkPdfDDalitzInc() {
00052 }
00053 
00054 // initializer:  
00055 void BdkPdfDDalitzInc::init(const char * theName, const char * theDesc,
00056                             RooAbsReal & m12, RooAbsReal & m13, 
00057                             BdkDalitzBase::Flavor flav,
00058                             Int_t spinResComp,
00059                             BdkPdfDDalitzInc* externalAmps) {
00060   
00061   // base class initialization:
00062   BdkPdfDalitzBase::init(theName, theDesc, m12, m13, flav);
00063   
00064   _spinResComp = spinResComp;  
00065   
00066   // initialize the parameters and the nonres PDF:
00067   initParameters();
00068   
00069   // initialize the owned res PDFs:
00070   _ownedRhoP.init(TString(GetName())+".rho+",
00071                   TString(GetTitle())+" rho+ Pdf", 
00072                   *_m12, *_m13, 
00073                   flavor(), 
00074                   externalAmps ? externalAmps->rhoP()->pdfType()->dalitzAmp() : 0,
00075                   BdkDDalitzAmp::RHOP,
00076                   _spinResComp);
00077   
00078   _ownedRhoM.init(TString(GetName())+".rho-",
00079                   TString(GetTitle())+" rho- Pdf", 
00080                   *_m12, *_m13, 
00081                   flavor(), 
00082                   externalAmps ? externalAmps->rhoM()->pdfType()->dalitzAmp() : 0,
00083                   BdkDDalitzAmp::RHOM,
00084                   _spinResComp);
00085   
00086   _ownedRho0.init(TString(GetName())+".rho0",
00087                   TString(GetTitle())+" rho0 Pdf", 
00088                   *_m12, *_m13, 
00089                   flavor(), 
00090                   externalAmps ? externalAmps->rho0()->pdfType()->dalitzAmp() : 0,
00091                   BdkDDalitzAmp::RHO0,
00092                   _spinResComp);
00093   
00094   // Point to the owned PDFs as the ones we're using:
00095   _externalResPdfs = kFALSE;
00096   _rhoP = &_ownedRhoP;
00097   _rhoM = &_ownedRhoM;
00098   _rho0 = &_ownedRho0;
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 // initialize with external resonant PDFs:
00103 void BdkPdfDDalitzInc::init(const char * theName, const char * theDesc,
00104                             BdkPdfDDalitzInc & resonanceSource) {
00105   // base class init using info from resonanceSource:
00106   BdkPdfDalitzBase::init(theName, theDesc, 
00107                          *(resonanceSource.m12()),
00108                          *(resonanceSource.m13()),
00109                          resonanceSource.flavor());
00110   
00111   // Point to the resonanceSource's resonance PDFs:
00112   _externalResPdfs = kTRUE;
00113   _rhoP = resonanceSource.rhoP();
00114   _rhoM = resonanceSource.rhoM();
00115   _rho0 = resonanceSource.rho0();
00116 
00117   // Initialize the parameters and the nonres PDF:
00118   initParameters();
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 void BdkPdfDDalitzInc::initParameters() {
00123   // initialize the fractions:
00124   _fracRhoP = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".fracRho+",
00125                              TString(GetTitle()) + " fracRho+",
00126                              0.3, 0, 1);
00127                              
00128   _fracRho0 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".fracRho0",
00129                              TString(GetTitle()) + " fracRho0",
00130                              0.3, 0, 1);
00131                              
00132   _fracNonres = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".fracNonres",
00133                              TString(GetTitle()) + " fracNonres",
00134                              0.3, 0, 1);
00135                              
00136   _nonres.init(TString(GetName())+".nonres_pdf",
00137                TString(GetTitle())+" nonres Pdf", 
00138                *_m12, *_m13, 
00139                flavor());
00140 
00141   // Don't need the constant term in the polynomial
00142   _nonres.c(0)->setVal(1);
00143   _nonres.c(0)->setConstant();
00144 
00145   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00146 }
00147 
00148 
00150 void BdkPdfDDalitzInc::calNorm (int events, Bool_t enforceNormalizeAll)
00151 {
00152   _rhoP->pdfType()->dalitzAmp()->calNorm(events, enforceNormalizeAll);
00153   _rhoM->pdfType()->dalitzAmp()->calNorm(events, enforceNormalizeAll);
00154   _rho0->pdfType()->dalitzAmp()->calNorm(events, enforceNormalizeAll);
00155 }
00156 
00157 
00158 // Build the PDF:
00159 void BdkPdfDDalitzInc::createPdf() {
00160   RooAbsPdf* sum1 = new RooAddPdf(TString(GetName()) + "rho+-_pdf",
00161                                   TString(GetTitle()) + " rho+- Pdf",
00162                                   *(_rhoP->getPdf()), 
00163                                   *(_rhoM->getPdf()), 
00164                                   *_fracRhoP);
00165 
00166   RooAbsPdf* sum2 = new RooAddPdf(TString(GetName()) + "rho+-0_pdf",
00167                                   TString(GetTitle()) + "rho+-0 Pdf",
00168                                   *(_rho0->getPdf()), 
00169                                   *sum1, 
00170                                   *_fracRho0);
00171 
00172   RooAbsPdf* thePdf = new RooAddPdf(TString(GetName()) + ".pdf",
00173                                     TString(GetTitle()) + " pdf",
00174                                     *(_nonres.getPdf()), 
00175                                     *sum2, 
00176                                     *_fracNonres);
00177  
00178   setPdf(*thePdf);
00179   _rhoP->setEfficiencyFunc(_effFunc);
00180   _rhoM->setEfficiencyFunc(_effFunc);
00181   _rho0->setEfficiencyFunc(_effFunc);
00182 
00183   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00184 }
